name: YumYumRecipes
0:
”Alexa, open Yum Yum Recipes”
”Alexa, begin cooking with Yum Yum Recipes”
”Alexa, load Yum Yum Recipes.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yum yum recipes
des: Yum Yum Recipes is a voice application that assists users in choosing and following a recipe to make. Marty, the application's culinary assistant helps users decide what breakfast, lunch, dinner, or snack recipe they want to cook. Marty then walks users through step-by-step instructions for preparing and cooking the meal chosen. YumYum Recipes offers a wide variety of delicious meals in different cuisines and cultures that are fit for all.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
